View All Specials








Why choose us?  





Fast Trade-in ValueTell us about your car and we’ll give you an accurate value today! Value Your Trade


No hassle financingWe’ll work with you to design a plan for your lifestyle & budget. Learn about financing


Competitive SpecialsBrowse our latest offers and save big on your next car! View Specials









Find Your Friend in the Automotive Industry at Royal Volkswagen of BloomingtonAre you a Columbus, IN or Martinsville, IN driver in search of your next friend in the automotive industry? At our dealership, we are well equipped to help with that. We stock the latest Volkswagen models and offer a range of automotive services. That way, you are able to get the dealership experience that you deserve.


















Shop Our New Volkswagen InventoryCompeting with a new Volkswagen model is no easy task. Whether you are in need of a car or an SUV, you can find it when you opt for a new Volkswagen. We carry models like the 2024 Volkswagen Atlas and the 2024 Volkswagen Jetta. And that means you are more than likely to find the right pick for your specific needs.We Carry a Variety of Used InventoryIf buying a new Volkswagen is not for you, don't worry. We take our used inventory seriously at our dealership. If you are shopping for a used car, truck or SUV for sale near you, we've got you covered. Each used vehicle we offer is tested and inspected before it is featured on our lot. And that is something that you are sure to appreciate.




View Inventory











Benefit from Our Automotive ServicesWhen shopping for a new Volkswagen or used vehicle, it is important to have the proper financing. Our finance team is experienced in all things auto finance. If you are looking to buy or lease your next purchase, we can get you the financing that you need to make it possible.Once you drive home to Bedford, IN, our relationship does not have to end. We have a Volkswagen service center to help with your service needs. You can also count on us for your parts needs as well.




Schedule Now

















Royal Volkswagen of Bloomington
